column4: Hi im wishing to install ubuntu 7.04 on my dell e1505 but im having a issue with the installer, when i start the installer i notice that my wireless light blinks alot and very fast on my laptop, at a certain point i see alot of jibberish around the screen and then it shows a message about Xserver not starting up
I'd try safeboot (or whatever the ubuntu equivalent is) or maybe the alternate CD. I have no experience there
